reviews.review: Genious puzzle game with a gloomy story
One of my favourite games.Perfect.

I've always loved Half-Life and Portal. I managed to finish this game in under 5 hours on my first try and then messed around with finding various Easter eggs. In the future I'd like to play it through again, but slower. It's a fun puzzle solving game with quite a few interesting twists along the way.

Play this one first. Going into this one blind is awesome, I totally recommend you do. This game gives you a feeling of isolation, like no other game I've played. The music is my favorite part, especially the song "Self Esteem Fund." It really captures the feelings this game gives you in a slow, and gloomy melody. Honestly this music makes me feel so many emotions, and is a fantastic experience. It is short, but then you will have Portal 2 to play which is probably my 3rd favorite game of all time, and that's not the same experience as this game but is still fantastic in it's own right. Love these games.
